query: I need assistance in planning a one-week trip for 2 people, commencing from Las Vegas and exploring 3 different cities in Washington. The trip will take place between March 24th and March 30th, 2022. Please, ensure our accommodations do not involve sharing rooms and allow visitors. We've opted not to self-drive on this trip. Our budget for this adventure is capped at $7,100.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Seattle,Everett,Spokane]
